channel.title: Running Hyperion, help
channel.description:
When I run the server I get this weird error, about the Xstream, probably a corrupt Jar file, but I don't know. I'm new to Hyperion so I need some help. This is the Run Error, and this is my eclipse error.
Run Error, (from a cmd): [code] Jun 02, 2012 3:19:24 PM org.rs2server.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:25 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:25 PM org.rs2server.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:25 PM org.rs2server.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:25 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 14978 object definitions. Jun 02, 2012 3:19:25 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:25 PM org.rs2server.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:26 PM org.rs2server.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/tho ughtworks/xstream/XStream at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.rs2server.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blocki ngExecutorService.java:50) at org.rs2server.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:82) at org.rs2server.Server.main(Server.java:37) Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstream/XStream at org.rs2server.util.XMLController.<clinit>(XMLController.java:38) at org.rs2server.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:61) at org.rs2server.rs2.model.World$1.call(World.java:156) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 8 more
Jun 02, 2012 3:19:26 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.boundary.BoundaryManager init INFO: Loading boundary definitions... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:26 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading item definitions... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:26 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loaded 14000 item definitions. Jun 02, 2012 3:19:26 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.NPCDefinition init INFO: Loading NPC definitions... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:26 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.NPCDefinition init INFO: Loaded 6391 NPC definitions. Jun 02, 2012 3:19:26 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.CombatNPCDefinition init INFO: Loading combat NPC definitions... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:26 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.equipment.EquipmentDefinition in it INFO: Loading equipment definitions... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:26 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.Shop init INFO: Loading Shops definitions... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:26 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.ItemSpawn init INFO: Loading item spawns... Jun 02, 2012 3:19:26 PM org.rs2server.rs2.model.minigame.impl.FightPits <init> INFO: Fight Pits minigame started. [/code]
Eclipse Error: [code] Error occurred during initialization of VM Too small initial heap
[/code]
For eclipse I have changed the Variables multiple times to over -Xmx2014 and it still says its too small so I know somethings wrong.

item.title: Running Hyperion, help
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

6Gb of ram, and Java7. I’ve heard you get this error with java7, so should I delete Java7 and then Eclipse will then read Java6? Because I have Java6 but it still reads java7

Read full topic

item.title: Running Hyperion, help
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

What version of Java and how much ram does your comp have?

Read full topic

item.title: Running Hyperion, help
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

When I run the server I get this weird error, about the Xstream, probably a corrupt Jar file, but I don’t know. I’m new to Hyperion so I need some help. This is the Run Error, and this is my eclipse error.
